page.title: 10FRATTON
page.content: Entertainment for me. In Fratton the best places are {Fratton Park}Football Ground and the library. There are some pubs in Fratton including the Magpie, the Jameson Arms, the Electric Arms and the Unicorn. I think the most boring day is {Sunday}because not many people come out to play but in the afternoon you can play football or tennis. The most enjoyable day in Fratton is a Saturday because you can go to Fratton Park to see 'Pompey'_ a Division Two{football}team playing. There are lots of{shops}in Fratton. The biggest one is the Co_op where they have lots of computers and computer games. The library in Fratton is called the Carnegie and it is eighty years old.
